Class BombGuy

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.BombGuy

  • public class BombGuy
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the Bomb Guy Object of Game

      Represents the space between BombGuy and top window

      • movement

        public char[][] movement(int i,
                         int j,
                         int direc,
                         char[][] map)
        Used for the movement of BombGuy according to given positions and direction
        Parameters:
        i - Represents Y-axis Position of Bomb Guy in Map
        j - Represents X-axis Position of Bomb Guy in Map
        direc - Represents direction of motion of Bomb Guy
        map - Represents the Map of current level
        Returns:
        Return a modified map (2-D Char Array)
